original_title: เลิฟเฮี้ยว เฟี้ยวต๊อด
overview: It's about a hapless hipster who the ladies think for some reason is super handsome. They fall all over themselves trying to be close, making it difficult for him to carry on in life and hold down a job.
tagline: Wanna be in love, have a date with tott.
title: There's Something About Tott
